DatahubIngestionCheckpoint.description: Checkpoint of a datahub ingestion run for a given job.

timestampMillis.description: The event timestamp field as epoch at UTC in milli seconds.

eventGranularity.description: Granularity of the event if applicable

messageId.description: The optional messageId, if provided serves as a custom user-defined unique identifier for an aspect value.

pipelineName.description:
The name of the pipeline that ran ingestion, a stable unique user provided identifier.
 e.g. my_snowflake1-to-datahub.

platformInstanceId.description:
The id of the instance against which the ingestion pipeline ran.
e.g.: Bigquery project ids, MySQL hostnames etc.

config.description: Json-encoded string representation of the non-secret members of the config .

state.description: Opaque blob of the state representation.

runId.description: The run identifier of this job.

TimeWindowSize.description: Defines the size of a time window.

unit.description: Interval unit such as minute/hour/day etc.

PartitionSpec.description: A reference to a specific partition in a dataset.

partition.description:
A unique id / value for the partition for which statistics were collected,
generated by applying the key definition to a given row.

timePartition.description: Time window of the partition, if we are able to extract it from the partition key.

startTimeMillis.description: Start time as epoch at UTC.

IngestionCheckpointState.description: The checkpoint state object of a datahub ingestion run for a given job.

formatVersion.description: The version of the state format.

payload.description: Opaque blob of the state representation.
